title: MicroserviceDecentralizedDataManagement - Q0001
text: What does decentralized data management mean in microservices architecture?

options.text: Each service manages its own data independently
All services share a single centralized database
Data is stored in a single monolithic schema
Data is managed by a central data warehouse

explanation: Decentralized data management means each microservice owns and manages its own data, ensuring autonomy and loose coupling.

title: MicroserviceDecentralizedDataManagement - Q0002
text: Which of the following is a key benefit of decentralized data management?
explanation: Decentralized data management improves autonomy by allowing services to manage their own data independently.

title: MicroserviceDecentralizedDataManagement - Q0003
text: Which of the following is a common anti-pattern in decentralized data management?

options.text: Sharing a single database between services

explanation: Sharing a single database between services creates tight coupling and violates the principle of decentralized data management.

title: MicroserviceDecentralizedDataManagement - Q0004
text: Which of the following is a challenge of decentralized data management?
explanation: Maintaining consistency across multiple independent data stores is a major challenge in decentralized data management.

title: MicroserviceDecentralizedDataManagement - Q0005
text: Which of the following patterns helps maintain consistency in decentralized data management?
explanation: The Saga pattern coordinates distributed transactions across services to maintain eventual consistency.

title: MicroserviceDecentralizedDataManagement - Q0006
text: Which of the following is a benefit of decentralized data management for scalability?

options.text: Each service can scale its database independently

explanation: Decentralized data management allows each service to scale its data store independently based on demand.

options.text: Each service owns its data and schema

title: MicroserviceDecentralizedDataManagement - Q0008
